quoteAuthorPairs.quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Michelangelo

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: Many failures are from people who didn't realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Edison

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Norman Augustine

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: If I had asked my customers what they wanted, they would have said 'a faster horse'.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Henry Ford

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: The master has failed more times than the beginner has even tried.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Stephen McCranie

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Chinese Proverb

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: Never give up on a dream because of the time it takes to accomplish it, the time will pass anyway.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Nightingale

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: Work hard in silence. Let your success be your noise.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Frank Ocean

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: I ask not for a lighter burden, but for broader shoulders.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Jewish Proverb

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: There are seven days in a week and 'someday' isn't one of them.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: The bigger the mountain, the better the view.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Unknown

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: Never had my palms read, always had my palms itching.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Big Sean

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: For me, giving up is way harder than trying.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Kanye West

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: The only difference between a winner and a loser is a winner plays until he wins.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Big KRIT

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: What good is being the one if you're the only one who knows it?
quoteAuthorPairs.author: J. Cole

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: While all of my closest friends are out partying, I'm just here making all the music that they party to.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Drake

quoteAuthorPairs.quote: The hard work puts you where the good luck can find you.
quoteAuthorPairs.author: Unknown
